item.title: Positive Semi Definite
item.description:
PSD differential equation Any matrix $A_{d 	imes d}$ is said to be PSD if $x^TAx \geq$ 0 $ orall$ vector $x_{d 	imes 1}$. Examples Identity matrix $I_{d 	imes d}$: $$ A =  egin{bmatrix} 1 & 0 & 0 & 0 
ewline 0 & 1 & 0 & 0 
ewline 0 & 0 & 1 & 0 
ewline 0 & 0 & 0 & 1 \end{bmatrix} $$ Then  egin{align} x^TAx &= \sum_{i = 1}^d \sum_{i = 1}^d A_{i,j}x_ix_j 
ewline &= \sum_{i = 1}^d A_{i,i} x_i^2
ewline &= \sum_{i = 1}^d x_i^2 
ewline &\geq 0 \end{align}
